item.title: [562\667] Adding ::item ::master and ::pure for all [562/667]
item.dc:creator: @jaredh jaredh
item.description:
@jaredh wrote:

Item:

if(cmd[0].equals("::item")) { if(cmd.length == 2 || cmd.length == 3) { int item = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]); int amount = 1; if(cmd.length == 3) { amount = Integer.valueOf(cmd[2]); } player.getInventory().addItem(item, amount); } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Syntax is: ::item <item> [amount=1]."); } }

Pure(This code just makes all combat levels 99, to change others either add/replace the skill id):

if(cmd[0].equals("::pure")) { if(cmd.length == 1) { for(int i = 0; i < Skills.SKILL_COUNT; i++) { player.getSkills().addXp(0, 14000000); player.getSkills().addXp(1, 14000000); player.getSkills().addXp(2, 14000000); player.getSkills().addXp(3, 14000000); player.getSkills().addXp(4, 14000000); player.getSkills().addXp(5, 14000000); player.getSkills().addXp(6, 14000000); player.getSkills().addXp(23, 14000000); } }

Master:

if(cmd[0].equals("::master")) { if(cmd.length == 1) { for(int i = 0; i < Skills.SKILL_COUNT; i++) { player.getSkills().addXp(i, 200000000); }

Read full topic
